text: The Naked Gun is an upcoming American action comedy movie directed by Akiva Schaffer. The movie is based on an original story written by Seth MacFarlane. It is the fourth movie in The Naked Gun franchise. The movie stars Liam Neeson as Frank Drebin Jr, alongside Pamela Anderson, Paul Walter Hauser, Kevin Durand, Danny Huston, Liza Koshy, Cody Rhodes, CCH Pounder, and Busta Rhymes. The movie is scheduled to be released in the United States on August 1, 2025, by Paramount Pictures. ==References== Category:2025 movies Category:2020s action comedy movies Category:The Naked Gun Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Akiva Schaffer
title: The Naked Gun (2025 movie)
